args: System checks clear.\nReboot successful.\n▷Welcome back, Laxi.◁
You were lucky those villagers didn't\nkill you.\n▷...You were watching?◁
I can still hear audio even during the\nreboot process.\n▷Ah, right...◁
▷I'm sorry, Laxi. I do understand\nwhat you mean about obtaining peace\nthrough fighting.◁
▷If we hadn't fought, that sylvan village\nwould have fallen to the empire.◁
▷I know that, and yet... I can't bear it.\nI can't help but try and find another way.◁
▷I want to stop all fighting.\nSo we can build a peaceful world.◁
I do not understand why you chose not\nto protect yourself—or MY body—when\nthose villagers were attacking.
However, I need to correct myself.\n▷Huh?◁
I said before that you were running from\nyour duty. That was incorrect.
You are fighting in your own way.
▷Oh, by the way: I had to take off your\ngloves to complete repairs, and I noticed\nthere are words on your hands.◁
Yes. They have been there since\nI was manufactured.
Our original Maestro inscribed his wish\nin them. They mean, ＂seek peace.＂
▷My body is gone now, but I had those\nsame words on my hands as well.◁
▷We may be opposites in many ways,\nbut we were both made with the same\ngoal in mind.◁
You have no way of knowing that.\nBut...it is a nice thought.
Yes, thanks to the sylvans from Luca's\nvillage.
They were incredible! Not even Sarisse\ncould match their archery skills.
They're slowin' down a little, but they've\nstill got it where it counts!
...Wait, why are you comparing them to\nher and not me?!
Er, sorry. Slip of the tongue.
Whoa, was that a laugh?!\nEr, but which one of you was it?
Ha ha.\n▷Hmm, do we tell them, Laxi?◁\nNo, I don't think we do, Mascula.
Did something happen between you two?
▷Why do you say that?◁\nWhat are you asserting?
Well, you guys are gettin' along now,\nright?

Negative. I have no desire to improve
relations.
▷That's not very nice.◁
And yet it is true.
Aaaand there we go. Ha ha!
Still, it's great to see everyone alive and\nwell. We took a few hits, but everyone\ngets to go home!
Yes, I'm sorry about that. I never expected\nthe villagers would attack you.
Hm? What's that written on your hand,\nLaxi?
One of these letters is written strangely.
Guess ol' Maestro's hand slipped, huh?
(I feel like something else is off, too...)
I guess it was just a simple mistake.
▷Laxi, don't stand on those flowers!\nTheir lives are just as important as ours.◁
Shall I avoid every blade of grass then,\ntoo?
▷W-well, maybe not ALL of them, but...\nAs many as possible!◁
